about.name: Ciril Arockiaraj
about.comments: Passionate IT professional with over 2+ years of experience in full-stack development. I specialize in building scalable web applications using modern technologies. My expertise spans across frontend frameworks, backend systems, and cloud infrastructure. I'm dedicated to writing clean, maintainable code and creating exceptional user experiences.
